Name: Pink Heaven
About the game: PINK HOUR is a 2D action game that was developed following the release of ' Kero Blaster '. In PINK HEAVEN, the pink office lady from Kero Blaster takes center stage as the protagonist and player character. Overcome foes, jump to evade danger and save the young Shopkeeper from the clutches of UFOs! By fulfilling certain conditions, you can unlock an additional Hard Mode. A short, fun game that can also be used to familiarize oneself with the play-style of Kero Blaster.
